
This JavaScript code enhances the functionality of a registration form for a conference. 
It ensures real-time validation of input fields such as name, email, credit card details, and activities selection. 
The form dynamically adjusts based on user interactions, like displaying an additional job role input when "Other" is selected. 
Checkbox inputs for conference activities are validated, and their total cost is calculated. 
Payment method options are toggled based on user selection. 
Validation error messages are displayed for invalid inputs, guiding users to correct their entries. 
Upon successful form submission, a custom alert is shown, and the page refreshes to reset the form. 
The code prioritizes accessibility by providing visible focus indicators for keyboard navigation. 
Overall, it improves the user experience and ensures data integrity during form submission.
